alerts.description: Discovery Call needs to be rescheduled
Rep has sent Corp Setup email

fieldUpdates.description: Updates the Portal Account Owner Email address on the Account to match the value of the lookup record
fieldUpdates.name: Portal Account Owner Email

fieldUpdates.formula: CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 5, TODAY() + 3, 6, TODAY() + 2, TODAY() + 1 )
fieldUpdates.name: Update Date For Reassignment(Account)

rules.description: Changes lead status to pitched when 1-1 attended equals true
Synchronizes all accounts with new SSO
rules.formula: OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Account_Status__c), ISCHANGED(Advisory_Status__c), ISCHANGED(Chargeback_Status__c), ISCHANGED(Finance_Status__c), ISCHANGED(Basic_Bookkeeping__c), ISCHANGED(Bookkeeping_Specialist__c), ISCHANGED(Business_Type__c), ISCHANGED(CP_Bookkeeping_Access__c), ISCHANGED(CP_Extended_Storage__c), ISCHANGED(Entity_Tax_Classification__c), ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISCHANGED(P2C_Customer_ID__c), ISCHANGED(Payroll_Manager__c), ISCHANGED(Previous_Owner__c), ISCHANGED(Primary_Contact__c), ISCHANGED(Schedule_E_2017__c), ISCHANGED(SmartVault_Folder__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Business_2015__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Business_2016__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Business_2017__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Business__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Personal_2015__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Personal_2016__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Personal_2017__c), ISCHANGED(Tax_Extension_Personal__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Business_2015__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Business_2016__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Business_2017__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Business__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Personal_2015__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Personal_2016__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Personal_2017__c), ISCHANGED(VTO_Personal__c), ISCHANGED(Lead_Type__c), ISCHANGED(Lead_Type_New__c), ISCHANGED(Lead_Source__c), ISCHANGED(Lead_Source_New__c), ISCHANGED(X2018_LZ_Equip_Est_Tax_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2019_LZ_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2020_LZ_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2021_LZ_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(X2022_BTP_Purchased__c), ISCHANGED(VIP__c), ISCHANGED(Embark_client__c), ISCHANGED(BillingCity), ISCHANGED(BillingCountry), ISCHANGED(BillingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(BillingState), ISCHANGED(BillingStreet), ISCHANGED(PortalAccountOwner__c), ISCHANGED(EIDL_Status__c) )

rules.description: Moves dead accounts to the dead queue

rules.description: WF used with eamil alert to send internal message to Accountant that they need to schedule an advisory.

criteriaItems.value: Partner Page Referral,Live Plan Referral,Dissolution Referral,Partner Referral,Partner Page Referral Taxes,Partner Page Referral Bookkeeping

rules.description: Workflow to change the Portal Account Owner Email field on the Account any time the Portal Account Owner value changes.
Marketing campaign (2019) to sell retirement plans to existing clients.
When a Bark/Paid Media Account owner is updated from a queue to a user (Or from General Queue to user) the Date For Reassignment is updated to one business day later
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(OwnerId), OR( BEGINS(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId) , '00G'), PRIORVALUE(Owner_Name__c) = 'General Lead' ), BEGINS(OwnerId , '005'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Lead_Source__c, 'Bark'), ISPICKVAL(Lead_Source__c, 'MVF Global'), INCLUDES(Campaign__c, 'MVF Global'), INCLUDES(Lead_Type_New__c, 'Marketing') ) )
